channel.title: [Suggestion] Double wide (or more) walkways
channel.description:
Would be a simple visual change to walkways (I think, but then again I cant do 3d stuff lol).
Right now If you put 2 walkway crossings, T crossing, or turns next to each other, you end up with holes in the corner of the floor. Putting 4 crossings together, or getting creative with wider walk ways really gets annoying with all the holes all over. I understand why its this way vanilla, but its annoying if you want more than a single wide walkway. Also perhaps extending the rails so when 2 T crossings etc are next to each other, you cant simply walk between the railings.
